name: little brick shooter prototype
description:
Hello there,

this this a prototype of a touhou 1-inspired game

the goal is to destroy the red tiles (or the bosses) with the bouncing ball

you can propel the ball with the bullet you shoot, those are also used to destroy enemies 

the charged shot does more damages to enemies and go trough them but destroy your ball

you ball can also be destroyed by some enemies/if the payer touch it/if you die

in the two last cases, the score multiplier will be reset  to 1

right now, 20 levels are playable including 2 bosses.

command:

move: left/right

shoot: space bar

pause: escape

charge shoot: hold space bar

this is the first game prototype i've made so i would like some thoughts about it if possible

(and bug reports!)

thank you for your help!

Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
